SELECT a.mat_lot mat_lot, a.mat_code mat_code, b.mat_name mat_name, c.act_name act_name, a.mat_out_amt mat_out_amt, a.prcs_dir_de_code prcs_dir_de_code, d.emp_name emp_name, a.mat_outd mat_outd, a.mat_exd mat_exd FROM mat_out a JOIN com_mat b ON(a.mat_code = b.mat_code) JOIN com_act c ON(a.act_code = c.act_code) JOIN com_emp d ON(a.emp_code = d.emp_code)
AND a.mat_code LIKE '%' || #{materialCode} || '%'
AND a.act_code LIKE '%' || #{accountCode} || '%'
AND a.mat_outd >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND a.mat_outd <= TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY a.mat_outd DESC
